keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations

lead_paragraph: Stephen Bird, the chief executive of the bank’s Asia-Pacific business, will succeed Manuel Medina-Mora as head of its global consumer bank in June.

headline.print_headline: Citigroup Names New Head of Consumer Bank in Management Shuffle
headline.main: Citigroup Names New Head of Consumer Bank in Management Shuffle

snippet: Stephen Bird, the chief executive of the bank’s Asia-Pacific business, will succeed Manuel Medina-Mora as head of its global consumer bank in June.
